scripts.yaml: jq '.[]|select(.chainName=="${NETWORK:-mumbai}")' config/mainnets.json | pnpm dlx hbs-cli -i subgraph.yaml_handlebar -e yaml -o thegraph
scripts.build2: pnpm yaml && pnpm codegen && pnpm graph-build
scripts.predeploy: pnpm clean && pnpm yaml && pnpm codegen && pnpm build && pnpm check
scripts.deploy: pnpm predeploy && cd thegraph && graph deploy zapaz/eip721-${NETWORK:-mumbai} --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token $THEGRAPH_KEY
